ar.text: Please tell us why you gave that score? i.e. recommending the event to a friend or colleague

cy.text: Please tell us why you gave that score? i.e. recommending the event to a friend or colleague

ja.text: Please tell us why you gave that score? i.e. recommending the event to a friend or colleague

th.text: โปรดบอกเราถึงสาเหตุที่คุณให้คะแนนนี้? หรือสาเหตุที่คุณจะแนะนำอีเวนต์นี้ให้กับเพื่อนหรือเพื่อนร่วมงาน

uk.text: Будь ласка, поясніть свою оцінку стосовно рекомендації знайомим та колегам

az_AZ.text: Zəhmət olmasa öz tanış və ya həmkarlarınıza tövsiyənizin qiymətləndirilməsini burada izah edin.

cs_CZ.text: Please tell us why you gave that score? i.e. recommending the event to a friend or colleague

da_DK.text: Fortæl os, hvorfor du gav den vurdering? Dvs. at anbefale arrangementet til en ven eller kollega

de_DE.text: Bitte teilen Sie uns mit, warum Sie diese Bewertung abgegeben haben? z. B. Empfehlung für Freund oder Kollegen

en_GB.text: Please tell us why you gave that score? i.e. recommending the event to a friend or colleague

en_US.text: Please tell us why you gave that score? i.e. recommending the event to a friend or colleague

es_ES.text: ¿Por qué otorgó esa calificación? Es decir, la recomendación del evento a un amigo o colega.

fi_FI.text: Kertoisitko meille, miksi annoit tämän arvosanan? eli tapahtuman suosittelusta ystävälle tai kollegalle

fr_FR.text: Veuillez nous dire pourquoi vous avez donné cette note ? C'est à dire en ce qui concerne la recommandation de l'événement à un ami ou un collègue

hu_HU.text: Please tell us why you gave that score? i.e. recommending the event to a friend or colleague

id_ID.text: Harap beri tahu kami mengapa Anda memberikan skor itu? Yaitu, merekomendasikan acara tersebut kepada teman atau sejawat

is_IS.text: Please tell us why you gave that score? i.e. recommending the event to a friend or colleague

it_IT.text: Può dirci perché ha dato quel punteggio? Cioè raccomandare l'evento a un amico o a un collega

ko_KR.text: Please tell us why you gave that score? i.e. recommending the event to a friend or colleague

nl_NL.text: Waarom hebt u die score gegeven? wat betreft het aanraden van het evenement aan een vriend of collega

no_NO.text: Please tell us why you gave that score? i.e. recommending the event to a friend or colleague

pl_PL.text: Please tell us why you gave that score? i.e. recommending the event to a friend or colleague

pt_BR.text: Qual o motivo para sua pontuação com relação à indicação da [eventname] para seu amigo / colega? Compartilhe conosco sua opinião.

pt_PT.text: Please tell us why you gave that score? i.e. recommending the event to a friend or colleague

ru_RU.text: Пожалуйста, объясните свою оценку по поводу рекомендаций знакомым или коллегам

sv_SE.text: Vänligen tala om för oss varför du satte det betyget? T-ex att rekommendera evenemanget till en vän eller kollega

tr_TR.text: Lütfen neden bu puanı verdiğinizi (yani bir arkadaşa veya iş arkadaşına tavsiye olasılığı) açıklayın

zh_CN.text: 能否请您说出这么打分的理由？例如：会把展会推荐给朋友或同事

zh_TW.text: 請告訴我們您的評分考慮：您會或者不會向朋友或同事推薦[eventname]的原因是什麼？

th.text: ความภักดีของลูกค้าแบบปากต่อปาก

az_AZ.text: İstehlakçıların rəğbətini öz sözlərinizlə izah edin

zh_CN.text: 净宣传者（逐字依照原文）
